page.title: Nucleus Elements
page.content:
Nucleus Elements provides a library of content patterns, supported by the Nucleus theme, that give you a quick way to format your static content in appealing ways, including custom pages. Choose a category of Elements to see them in action.

{{block type="cms/block" block_id="nucleus-elements-navigation"}}

page.title: Nucleus Elements: Interactive
page.content:
{{block type="cms/block" block_id="nucleus-elements-navigation"}}
  • Elements:
  • Accordion
  • Tabs
  • Modal
  • Block Toggle

Accordion

Use this element by copying the static block titled nucleus-accordion

The Accordion element scales down to a collapsible/expandable interface at smaller screen sizes.

{{block type="cms/block" block_id="nucleus-accordion"}}

Tabs

Use this element by copying the static block titled nucleus-tabs

{{block type="cms/block" block_id="nucleus-tabs"}}

Modal

Use this element by copying the static block titled nucleus-modal

The Modal element defines content that will open in a modal window when the trigger button is activated.

{{block type="cms/block" block_id="nucleus-modal"}}

Block Toggle

Use this element by copying the static block titled nucleus-block-toggle

{{block type="cms/block" block_id="nucleus-block-toggle"}}
